alert.note: Alert for Asotin; Garfield (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 03 at 1:24PM PDT until June 03 at 1:45PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM PDT FOR EAST CENTRAL GARFIELD AND NORTHWESTERN ASOTIN COUNTIES... At 123 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles southeast of Pomeroy, or 17 miles west of Clarkston, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Peola. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
